output.dependency: The flight code column indicates specific flight information, and therefore any departure time listed here must align with the same flight code.
The flight code column indicates specific flight information, and the arrival time listed must correspond to that flight.
The flight code column indicates specific flight information, and the scheduled time of departure must relate to that flight.
The flight code column indicates specific flight information, and the actual departure time must be dependent on the same flight code.
The scheduled departure time is semantically related to the scheduled arrival time, which indicates the typical duration of the flight.
The scheduled departure time is semantically related to the scheduled departure time of the flight, as it can indicate when updates are needed.
The scheduled departure time and the actual departure time are syntactically dependent, as they must both relate to the same flight code.
